short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gripe allows you to share your interactions and feedback with any website in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gripe allows Chrome users to post their less-than-stellar customer experiences and attach these reviews to a companyâ€™s website.  As Gripe users browse the internet, the extension will notify users that gripes were found for a particular domain or business and visitors can read these reviews to make better informed decisions about the company or particular website.  

Companies and website owners can also view the same content and determine if there are issues that should be addressed.

Gripe content is user generated content and experiences and opinions should be read objectively.    Gripe is determined to remove content that is deemed offensive, harmful in nature, illegal, pornographic, not in the best interest of our users, or that goes against our terms or the terms and conditions.
